explains: adj. 值得注意的，显著的

sentences.en: I found nothing particularly noteworthy to report.
sentences.cn: 我没什么特别值得关注的事情可报告。

sentences.en: The most noteworthy feature of the list is that there are no women on it.
sentences.cn: 该名单最值得关注的是上面没有女性。

sentences.en: It is noteworthy that the programme has been shifted from its original August slot to July.
sentences.cn: 该节目从最初的8月档移到7月值得关注。
